results.title: Cost-effectiveness of atenolol compared to propranolol as first-line treatment of infantile haemangioma: A pilot study
results.text_hl: ...Of the five @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ identified, two had single @<m>DISEASE_271245</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:271245 @@@IH@@@ and three had multiple @<m>DISEASE_271245</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:271245 @@@IH@@@ that resulted in a total of nine individual lesions treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

results.title: Prognostic Factors for Long-term Aesthetic Outcome of Infantile Haemangioma Treated with Beta-blockers
results.text_hl: These results, based on multivariable analyses of @<m>DISEASE_271245</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:271245 @@@IH@@@ treated with either @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, are substantiated by results of previous studies using univariable analyses of untreated @<m>DISEASE_271245</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:271245 @@@IH@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_271245</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:271245 @@@IH@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@.

results.title: Treatment of infantile haemangiomas with atenolol: comparison with a historical propranolol group.
results.text_hl: This study indicates that @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ is effective in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_271245</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:271245 @@@IH@@@.
